resources.string: Sorry, but you don\'t seem to be at a Floordoor concert.
Exclusive downloads are only available while you are present at a venue during a show.
We would like your location to check for concerts and provide you exclusive downloads.

We appreciate your support of our craft, and as lifelong fans of music, there's no greater joy than going to a great live show. We want to say thank you for coming to see our artists perform. As a token of our gratitude, we decided to break down as many barriers as possible between you and the music. This application will allow you to access exclusive downloads from Floordoor for free whenever you're in attendance at one of our shows. 
We hope you enjoy it. 
 
 Cheers,

 The Floordoor Family
We are emailing your download links...
There was a problem sending your download. Please try again.
This app cannot function without Google Play Services. Please install Google Play Services from the Play Store and then try again.
